h2_title: Yaoguai King Boss Battle - Red Loong
content: Other times, he’ll slam down his front claws in quick succession, creating lightning spots that will detonate in the area after a short moment, requiring you to quickly dodge away or risk taking major shock damage. Take too much, and you’ll be taking double damage until you use medication to remove the effect.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Red_Loong.md', within the main section titled 'Red Loong', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai King Boss Battle - Red Loong'.
The content is as follows:
Other times, he’ll slam down his front claws in quick succession, creating lightning spots that will detonate in the area after a short moment, requiring you to quickly dodge away or risk taking major shock damage. Take too much, and you’ll be taking double damage until you use medication to remove the effect.
